item.title: Trees on footpath overhanging into garden, 23rd February
item.description:
The silver birch trees on the footpath behind 11-14 Grenadier Close are overgrown and lower branches overhanging into gardens, at risk of damage to my shed. Blocks all light in summer and fills garden with leaves in autumn. Request that lower branches are removed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Grenadier Close, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 23rd February
item.description:
Customer has called and says the water trickles from this drain and they are concerned that if it freezes, this will be a hazard to their property. Please can they understand what is planned for this location to sort the issue. They only have a contact phone number to receive updates.
Report on FixMyStreet
